participant_1.background:
I wash my clothes when I have to.
I sometimes think I am too busy to keep up with my family, but I try my best because I love them.
I'm afraid of not being able to protect my son from harm.
I'd love to show off my gummy worm collection to my friends if I was famous.
I am an average weight, but I am not happy with it

participant_2.background:
I took a few deep breaths and tried to center myself.
I am proud of my first home purchase.
I'd brag about how good my cake baking skills are.
I'm a determined person who doesn't give up easily, even when faced with challenges.
I spend time with my book club and read books I love.

content.text: I am feeling overwhelmed with life and would love to talk to someone who can help me sort things out.
I am here for you. I am a good listener and offer advice when asked for.
I appreciate your willingness to help. I am trying to balance my family life with my career. I feel like I am always doing something for someone else and not taking any time for myself.
It is important to take time for yourself. If you do not take care of yourself, you will not be able to take care of anyone else.
I know you are right. I just need to make more time for me. I am trying to lose weight and get in shape so I can be healthier.
That is a great goal! I would be happy to help you with your diet and exercise.
Thank you! I would love that. I am a bit of a gummy worm addict and I need to cut back on my sugar intake.
I can help you with that. I have been known to bake a pretty good cake myself.
I would love to try one of your cakes! I am always looking for new recipes to try.
I would be happy to share some of my recipes with you. I am also a member of a book club and we read some really great books.
I love to read! I am always looking for new books to read.
We could have a book club together. We could read some of the books from my book club.
That would be fun! I would love to do that. I am so glad I met you. You seem like a great person.
I am glad I met you too. You seem like a great person. We should talk again soon.
I would love that. I have a few gummy worms on my desk if you want one.
I would love one! Thank you
